title: Peninsula Place - Ground Floor Unit available 9/1
posting_body: Welcome home to this ground floor 2 bedrooms 2 bath unit at Peninsula Place.
Walk through redwood trees to your private deck entrance.
This unit was newly painted and updated with hardwood floors, crown molding and high-end materials throughout.
The main bedroom suite has an ensuite bathroom with double closets and 1 covered parking spot is included.
This unit is centrally located - close to the laundry room as well as the pool.
The HOA fee includes access to all Peninsula Place amenities as well as water, sewage, and trash.
Peninsula Place is a quiet park-like community featuring 4 swimming pools, tennis courts, exercise room, clubhouse, guest parking and 24 hour private patrol.
The location is centrally located within walking distance to Commodore playground, HQ YouTube and Walmart offices.
Bayhill shopping Center and Tanforan Mall are minutes away with easy access to Highway 280/380 & 101 as well as BART.
Included:
- 1 parking spot
- Water
- Sewage
- Trash
Not included:
- PGE
- Cable
- Internet
This is a non-smoking unit.
Tenants must abide by all HOA rules and regulations.
